answers.answer: Seek a second opinion. It sounds like it may be Swine Flu per what I've read about it... Best of luck getting better.
they haven't tested for it yet (its not me :P) its just really strange

question: Symptom-•	Pneumonia•	Coughing , Diabetes•	Spikes in blood sugar, up to 600•	101 degree temperature•	Insanely hot•	Bloody noses•	Shortness of breath•	Stomach aches, and headaches•	Mild MR.Doctor’s notes-Coughing all the time, can hear the fluid in lungs. Constantly getting bloody noses, and a temperature of 101 degrees, given Tylenol, and Aspiren within a period of 4 hours, and still no decrease in temp. Given Nebulizer, no help with lungs, or breathing. When on Antibiotics the Pneumonia got worse.still have no idea what this is.
title: this isn't adhd. but still weirdd :P
